EmailTemplate.name: 202008_EMEAI_C&PS_Product_Technical_Service_Updates_MC.202008_EMEAI_C&PS_Product
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Product Technical Service Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
We have introduced a new function within MyAerospace portal to help you get the latest information on in-service product reliability improvements, which have been addressed by Honeywell. You will also see summary of the issues and program schedule.
Please visit Technical Support <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services-and-support/support-center/technical-support?]]> to learn more or visit directly to Services & Support > Support > Product Technical Service Request Updates <[[https://cwa.honeywell.com/cwaRendered/login3.jsp;jsessionid=nO16Z_P4dGKtmMsoZtC9rCJdBEz5WvkKA1vs6WN9.hic006381?appid=6689&lang=EN]]>.
We will updating critical reliability program regularly via this forum.
Best regards Honeywell Customer and Product Support Team
